AudioDucker 1.0.0

Welcome to AudioDucker!

AudioDucker is a macOS utility that automatically ducks your media volume when you start talking. Perfect for streamers, podcasters, and professionals who want their music to automatically fade out when they speak, and resume when they stop. Key Features:
  • Automatic Ducking: Automatically pause or lower media volume when your microphone is active.
  • Streaming Mode: Uses advanced AI voice activity detection (VAD) to differentiate speech from background noise.
  • Customizable Actions: Choose whether to pause/mute or simply reduce volume.
  • Lightweight & Private: Runs locally on your Mac; no audio is ever recorded or transmitted.
